titleStmt.title: [Election Notice] 1815 Aug. 13, Columbia, [TN] [to Governor] Willie Blount / [verified and sent by] James Brown : a machine readable transcription of an image

publicationStmt.publisher: University of Tennessee Special Collections Library

availability.p: This work is the property of the Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN. It may be used freely by individuals for research, teaching, and personal use as long as this statement of availability is included in the text. For all other use contact the Tennessee State Library and Archives, 403 Seventh Avenue North, Nashville, TN 37243-0312. (615) 741-2764.

bibl.title: [Election Notice] 1815 Aug. 13, Columbia, [TN] [to Governor] Willie Blount / [verified and sent by] James Brown
bibl.note: This is a notice of the election of military officers held in Columbia, TN on Aug. 13, 1815. It is verified by James Brown and sent to Governor Willie Blount on Aug. 14, 1815

projectDesc.p: Created for the University of Tennessee Digital Library

editorialDecl.p: Quotation marks retained as data except inside q tags
Errors in transcription of the printed text controlled with X-Metal 2.1 spell-checker; text has also been thoroughly proofread.
Corrections and normalization represented by editorial tags.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

refsDecl.p: ID attributes provided for only those pages, chapters, or illustrations toward which a reference or figure points.

div.p:
We the undersigned Judges of an Election held in the town of Columbia on the 13th Day of August 1815, Do Certify that George Cockburne is Duly Elected Captain in said Company in the place of resigned, and that Hugh McDougle is legally Elected Lieutenant in said Company in the place of
Geo. George Campbell resigned, according to a writ of — Election issued by Lt. Joseph Brown Colonel of the 27th Regement Regiment Sworn to and subscribed this Day and Date above written

closer.add:
I Do Certify that ⁁ the above Was legally held according to My Order given under my hand 14th august 1815
Jas,, James Brown LCC
27th Regt. Regement T.M
